PreceptDef.label: implants

The key to experimentation is not being afraid of the results. We will labour incessantly to achieve new breakthroughs.

PreceptDef.label: genomorpher
PreceptDef.description:
Measure twice, cut once. A carefully designed experiment has much greater odds of success.
